thread.title: Tom Hanks and More Celebrities Pay Tribute to Bill Paxton After His Death
thread.title_full: Tom Hanks and More Celebrities Pay Tribute to Bill Paxton After His Death

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Tom Hanks and More Celebrities Pay Tribute to Bill Paxton After His Death
text:
Celebrities React to Bill Paxton's Death Tom Hanks and More Celebrities Pay Tribute to Bill Paxton After His Death February 26, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Tom Hanks and More Celebrities Pay Tribute to Bill Paxton After His Death 
Bill Paxton died at age 61 on Saturday , leaving behind an onscreen legacy. Throughout his life in the spotlight , Paxton gained the respect and admiration of his costars and fellow actors and filmmakers. Tributes from his peers have been flooding in, and one of the first people to speak out about his death has been director James Cameron, who worked with Paxton on a number of films, including Titanic , Aliens , and Apollo 13 . Read his full statement as well as tributes from more of Paxton's friends ahead.
